commit message: updated changelog for 0.4.4 release

the newest Android Eclipse wants to add this, so let it...

I don't really know what its for, but its annoying me.  So committing
it means I won't be reminded of it.
build with NDK's 4.7 toolchain aka gcc 4.7

set NDK platform level to minSdkVersion from AndroidManifest.xml

NDK platform level, aka APP_PLATFORM, is equivalent to minSdkVersion

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/14551113/android-ndk-multiple-api-levels
add Norwegian Bokm√•l translation (thanks kingu!)

use canonical path to SD card to make sure its a real path (fixes #64)

It seems that the new /storage dir structure has some weird tricks in it,
and the path that Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory() does not always
return a real path, but some kind of special emulated path.

log warning message when the mount point is not found

This will set up the 'Configure Image' button, and clicking it will resolve
the problem.
disable Install button if the 'Image Size' EditText has an invalid value (closes #55)
bump version to code 10 name 0.4.5

InstallActivity: Install button steals focus to prevent keyboard pop up

Its quite annoying sometimes that the keyboard always pops up in the
InstallActivity view.
a newline is needed when appending log messages to the main log

put install-specific settings into install.conf (fixes #55)

These variables are only needed at install time, and only by the install
script, so make them into a native file that is directly sourced by the
install script.
upgrade busybox to v1.21.1 to get some Android fixes
update busybox_config for v1.21.1
build busybox with verbose usage messages
update Polish translation (thanks mickul!)
udpate Vietnamese translation (thanks ppanhh!)
add Simplified Chinese translation (thanks xtoaster!)

downgrade Apache Commons IO from 2.4 to 2.2 to support Java 1.5/android-8

Android did not have full Java 1.6 support until android-9 (2.3).
add support for lzma and xz compression, sid is starting to use it (closes #70)
bump target SDK version to android-18 (4.3)
add Brazilian Portuguese as base PT translation (thanks Ganem!)
add Slovenian translation (thanks ajitam!)
update Turkish translation (thanks basarancaner!)

fixed syntax error in Brazilian Portuguese translation

The transifex text fields had \' in them, which were transposed into \\'
upon download.  I removed the \ in front of ' and all is good.
